short_description:
• Highest quality grip equipment available on the market
• Pay as used expendables
• A la carte electric package available based on customer needs.
long_description: Our grip packages are made to suit your productions needs, whether you have a small photo shoot, music video, commercial or a feature film.   We have included a large array of frames, rags, flags, rigging gear and basic grip equipment in each package.  We also offer a large variety of additional grip equipment that can be added to whichever package you choose.
